titles.title: REAL Tuna Act of 2018
To exclude the species known as bullet tuna and frigate tuna from the standard of identity established for canned tuna, and for other purposes.
Re-Establishing Accuracy in Labeling of Tuna Act of 2018
REAL Tuna Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Re-Establishing Accuracy in Labeling of Tuna Act of 2018 or the REAL Tuna Act of 2018
This bill revises the Food and Drug Administration requirements for canned tuna to exclude the species bullet tuna (Auxis rochei)and frigate tuna (Auxis thazard).
